ability.flavor: You push an ally to use a heroic ability sooner than they otherwise would.

metadata.flavor: You push an ally to use a heroic ability sooner than they otherwise would.
metadata.item_name: You've Still Got Something Left (9 Focus)

effects.effect: The target uses a heroic ability with the Strike keyword as a free triggered action, and deals extra damage with that ability equal to your Reason score. The ability has its Heroic Resource cost reduced by 1 + your Reason score (minimum cost 0).
